original_text: They shall not take a wife that is a whore, or profane; neither shall they take a woman put away from her husband: for he is holy unto his God.
korean_text: 그들은 부정한 창녀나 이혼 당한 여인을 취하지 말지니 이는 그가 여호와 하나님께 거룩함이니라

sentences.original_text: They shall not take a wife that is a whore
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 창기인 아내를 맞이하지 못할 것이니

sentences.original_text: neither shall they take a woman put away from her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 남편에게서 버림받은 여자도 맞이하지 못할 것이니

sentences.original_text: for he is holy unto his God
